name: The Motown
description: This cocktail recipe comes from Toasted Oak Grill & Market just outside Detroit, Michigan. The drink is evocative of candied nuts, and it's ideal for serving alongside a gingerbread or spice-cake dessert.
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces Zeppelin Bend Straight Whiskey or unpeated Scotch

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing glass, stir together whiskey, Pimm's, pistachio liqueur, and Tawny Port with ice until well chilled, about 20 seconds. Strain into an ice-filled rocks glass. Garnish with orange twist.
